agent_bio.description:
Jayne Marvin’s background started in a small family car dealership in upstate New York. Life lessons such as honesty, integrity, hard work and valuing people formed character qualities that are integral in
the real estate venue. Jayne acquired her Real Estate license in 2010 when she went to work for Properties of
The Villages as an assistant. From there, she became an independent Realtor.  She went on to win “Rookie of the Year” in 2013 and was nominated as one of three in the nation.

Kris DiLeva’s experiences are vast. It began with operating a successful lemonade stand during her “tween” years. She then acquired 13 years of experience with a consumer products company in Sales and
Marketing. This led to creating and operating three successful restaurant ventures. During the same time, Kris acquired an interest in the design of log homes and transforming those visions into their construction. Each venture required determination and an ability to think “outside the box”. The success of both ventures’ success stemmed from atypical marketing and design strategies.


Linda Engelbrecht’s  background started when her parents bought a gift shop when she was in high school. This was the start of Linda‘s development in sales and marketing.  She progressed to management, then program administrator to a local nonprofit health service provider.   Upon relocation to The Villages in 2004, she acquired her real estate license. Her individual success will be a great addition to Your 24/7 Team.


Your are going to "LOVE"  Your 24/7 Team!
agent_bio.person_name: Jayne Marvin , Kris Dileva, Linda Engelbrecht
agent_bio.slogan: You are going to "LOVE" Your 24/7 Team
agent_bio.full_name: Jayne Marvin , Kris Dileva, Linda Engelbrecht

team_members.name: Jayne Marvin , Kris Dileva, Linda Engelbrecht, Agent
team_members.person_name: Jayne Marvin , Kris Dileva, Linda Engelbrecht

feedbackData.comment: As first time buyers, my boyfriend and I really appreciated all of the help these ladies provided. We love our new home! Thanks again ladies!

This was a first experience in buying a home outside our state.  The service from this team is exceptional!  They walked us through the whole process and answered questions we had of them and/or the owners within minutes!  They said upfront we would have more questions after the sale and they would continue to work with us to help any way they can.  We have bought several homes over the years and have never experienced this type of service.  We will not hesitate for any possible  future transactions to go back to Jayne, Kris and Carol...as they truly are Your  24/7 Team!

We found the 24/7 Team through USAA and was contacted by Jayne literally within one minute of submitting our information. We worked with the Team to buy "sight unseen" because we live out of state and relied on FaceTime and a lot of communication to find the right property. Once under contract we got updates frequently right up until closing. The home is perfect and we couldn't be happier. Thank you Jayne, Kris and Carol!

Many years we have sold and purchased homes, many times, TOO many, we had bad experiences with our agents. I don't take time out to write reviews but let me tell you, THIS TEAM impressed us!  Their service level was beyond what we expected! We felt that our entire experience with them was all about making sure we had a pleasant experience, selling our home was secondary. Don't settle, talk with these girls!

The individual realtors are each knowledgeable and professional and that's what makes Your 24/7 Team available to answer any question and assist with every step of the way to either get your house sold or find your new home.  I can't tell you how many times I called with a question, sometimes the same question a couple of times until I understood.  Carol, Jayne and Kris were always ready to help me until I understood.  Each of them have their own personality and combined, they are ready to work hard for you.

This  was an amazing team!! As i am a first time home buyer and they were at my beckon call! I would absolutely use them next time. Thank you for all you have done!! i could not ask for a more perfect experience and beautiful home you all found for me and the boys!

The Responsiveness  of this team is beyond what we expected. There are just not enough words about these ladies. For us, working with a team seems to ease the process.  You will not regret working with these girls! We consider them friends!
Amazing Team! Can't say enough about working with this team! The Power of 3! Just Amazing!

recommendationData.comment: Haven’t made a decision yet to relocate but had to write this! It’s taken a year for us to get to a point almost ready to buy! These ladies have been great and never once do we get the feeling we are wasting their time! We were with another agent prior and he just stopped keeping in touch, guess the sale was not fast enough for him! These girls are great and we so appreciate their continued effort to keep us informed

Absolute GREAT Team, and works as a team!  We used another team a few years back....well he called him a Team but the others knew nothing...everytime we called they had to call him, many times this delayed us getting information we needed fast!  Thanks girls, you all were just amazing!
THE BEST! Professional and they went beyond in both our selling and purchase! Far more than we expected, FAR more than any of previous agent we have used have in the past! Just the BEST

There clearly is an advantage of working with a team, this team I found to be hands on...all three! We have used teams before...we see a difference working with these ladies, other teams we used called themselves teams, and yes, they had people working FOR them, NOT with...big difference! The teams who had a staff always had to go to leader to get us the information we needed when we called! That is not a team! A team is all those involved as a team know what's going on...all the time! Thanks, you girls are clearly ahead of the times! We so appreciated how you handled all issues before we could hang up the phone! Great Team! A Real Team!

Talk about wonderful, we so enjoyed working with these girls.  We could court on them 24/7! They stand behind their name!  We appreciated that, as we so enjoyed knowing if we needed them anytime, they were there!

Selling our home was a wonderful experience with these ladies, first and most important, anytime we called, they answered, then add to that they paid for all the repairs needed to close, they even handled setting up the appointments add to that, we packed up and they sent a cleaning crew in which took a major load off of us!  Selling was a joy, we had it easy during this entire process! WHY would anyone settle for LESS! Just so all knows, we had over $600 in repairs that had to be addressed!  Its just unheard of that these girls took on the entire responsibility to hire and have repaired...Call them!

I HAVE no idea why anyone would not want the power of 3! I finally felt paying such commisions was worth it! Service was beyond what we expected! Added to it all, we packed up, movers came, and in comes a professional cleaning crew to prepare our Home to close, taking a load off our shoulders! Add to the home being cleaned they even had the home pressured washed!  If the buyers only knew what our agents did for not only us but for them! Thanks girls! OH, my wife just mentioned they paid for all the repairs that had to be completed, cost was only $312.00, and handled the repairs getting done! Really these girls were the best of the best!

THE BEST! We purchased a home in the Villages using these ladies, upon our walk through the home was left a mess! The seller refused to have cleaned, the agent certainly didn't offer even tho she was about to recieve over $ 9,000 in commissions! These girls without a second thought picked up the phone within 4 hours a team of cleaners came in spent at least  4 hours with 3 people and had this home cleaned! If they had not done that, what a mess we would have been faced with! Thank so much ladies!

Purchased 13 homes over my lifetime, this is the first time we felt the need to write a review! Don't hire these girls,  that will be your first MISTAKE! These ladies are the best of the best! The most important thing we look for is just knowing if we call, someone will return the call, these girls never did! THEY answered EVERYTIME! Thanks to all three for a wonderful experience selling our home!

I am not sure why anyone would NOT want three people working in their behalf when selling their home, these girls were just amazing! I can't recall that any agent we ever used in the past had my home cleaned the day we moved out! What a blessing that was! Add to that they paid for the repairs that had to be completed and handled them, we did nothing! Add to all this, I called many times and they answered EVERY TIME! Hands down the best we ever have experienced!

Just plain wonderful group of ladies! Purchased a home, wasn’t their listing, the sellers moved out left a mess! Our movers will due to arrive the next day! Much to our surprise they sent a team of cleaners in! We arrived and just overwhelmed by the fact they had the home prepared for our move-in!  Otherwise, we were already set up not only move in but clean as we unpacked! Thanks ladies! That really showed us your interest was not just selling us a house!

Honestly we haven’t seen such detail given as these ladies gave to selling our home!  Highly impressed! They spend 30 minutes just moving a few things around and odd enough what a difference those changes made! They were so right, just a little change can open up the space! Listed our home and within 30 days we had a contract! We packed up, mover came...then much to our surprise they sent in a cleaning crew to prepare the home for the buyers! We were so delighted not to have to clean! These ladies were everything we read on them! We were just amazed at the service they offered through the entire process!

We are not sure what we expected being first time buyers, but we got the unexpected!  We were nervous naturally, but these ladies really made this process go so smooth....before we knew it, the movers had us moved in! Great service! Sharp ladies for sure, what was a surprised to us, they had the home professional cleaned top to bottom it was amazing.....that made the move so much more enjoyable! Thanks to you all!

All I can say is thank you! What a joy to have worked with you 3!  My selling experience was beyond expectations, the buying process was even better!  These ladies didn't miss a beat! Not only that...they do work 24/7! I had to text one early am before getting on a plane, had a question I needed answered , I assumed they would get my text first thing in am, NOPE! I texted at 3:45 am before My plan took off....within seconds I got my answer! That is service people!

Our Experienced amazing! We purchased a home in the Villages, sellers left the home dirty! List agent didn't care or offer support to address, the girls jumped in, had a company there to deep clean..it was amazing, made our move in experience enjoyable! Thanks..Really!

Thank you very much, you guys really helped my mother beyond what I expected! Our Family will forever be grateful! She is loving her life as the new asssited living in the Villages, we all can rest easy now with Mom at a wonderful place, thank so much
WE highly suggest you call this team! From Experience most agents only care about one thing and it's NOT the service they provide or the knowledge that helps ease the process.  Excellent service!

The experience was beyond what we expected! These ladies listed our parents home  and they made it so easy for our family during this sad time! They took care of the repairs that cost over $600 and had the home cleaned and pressured washed, we worried about nothing! Thanks to all three of you for making this a pleasant experience during a very tragic time for our family

Just an amazing group!! Solid team work! This team really showed us that we had 3 working in our best interest 24/7!  Amazing service and they even had our home professionally cleaned before the movers arrived and it wasn’t even their listing! They just care!

We selected these ladies from all the great comments we read and trust us when we say....we can't say enough about this team. We have purchased many homes, by far, this was the best experience we have ever had! Being available 24/7 certainly put us at ease, and it was so true, they were indeed available 24/7. There is just so much more to say, but the reviews say it all!  Amazing team!

The reviews are exactly what you get!  We can't say enough about this group of ladies! Everything you will read on these reviews are correct!  Just a joy to work with!  A wonderful experience, they were always available so even the 24/7 team name is for real! Great Team!

For us to take the time to write this, trust me....there is a reason!  We found this team just amazing, we can't say enough about them! All 3 of them played a major role in how well the sale of our home and the purchase of a new home played out!  Highly suggest you reach out to them for any real estate need, buying or selling, we had one of the best experiences ever with this team!

We so appreciated all this team did for our family! They really took a lot time to help us find the perfect community! We can’t thank them enough! We felt they would not rest until the right home was found! We are ever so thankful for finding this group of ladies!

There are just not enough words to Express our appreciation for  the hard work you ladies endured during the sale of our home!  We cant thank you enough!  Thanks so much for also telling us about Lakeside Landing -our new home will be completed in July! You guys knew exactly what was a good fit for our family ! Thanks to you all!

Wonderful group of ladies! Enjoyed working with them,  and found they go far beyond what I expected or have experienced with prior agents that I have used!  I went with these ladies only because of the reviews I read on them, had to know.....know I know....the reviews are for real!  Thanks Ladies, what a wonderful experience

BY FAR-Our BEST experience with a Realtor- in fact, having a team of 3 was a great experience to your buying experience!  24/7-it's true, we were able to reach them without having to playing phone tag!  Great Team, highly recommend!

We have never taken the time to write a review,  with that said just know our experience was so unexpectedly pleasant we just had to do this shout out!  There just isn’t enough words to say  how much we enjoyed working with this team!  The entire process was flawless! We were the buyers and during our walk-through we were so disappointed to know we would have to clean before the movers arrived, we just were not happy at the end of the process!  Until we Arrived to the home after the closing. The Team has the home professionally cleaned! Even the carpet! We could not believe it!  Now you understand why we felt the need to write this!  Thank you so much for making our move in so much easier!

We have had several experiences using a team, only to find out not all teams are really teams- this experience with the 24/7 Team was exactly what we were looking for! These ladies were amazing, yes...24/7 there are! Most important for us with our complex sale was the fact no matter who we called on the team, they had the answer- one didn't habe to say, let me check with The other team members-we GOT answers right there on the spot! WE now have a GO TO Realtor for any future needs we may have- great team and just down to earth ladies! We thank you each!

These girls really did an excellent job throughout the entire process, my first stress free closing and I thank them! Not to mention they had the home cleaned professionally and even pressure washed the patio. All because they really go the extra mile . Thanks to all 3, the pleasure was mine working with you each
Just Amazing!  Hands Down, Amazing experience  purchased and sold a home with this team! Having 3 Realtors working for us in the process was priceless. 24/7 service is real! Always Available
recommendationData.display_name: Happy and Lucky to be living the dream in the Villages

recommendationData.comment: Two WORDS! THE BEST. But we can't stop with two words, these girls really do put service first! We were very impressed with every aspect of selling our home. We used another agent, home sat for 6 months, never could reach agent, never saw any ads, nothing! WE had hired the top agent in Sumter, and nothing, so top means nothing, what is needed was this team who worked non-stop for two weeks, until we saw the PENDING sign go up! These Girls mean business
Now that we have had the opportunity to work with 3 to list our home, we will ever consider going back to a solo agent! They were beyond what we expected!

Why ever would one want to use one agent in their sale of home,,we discovered the difference with these girls! We were always able to reach them, unlike prior Village agent we used, once we listed our home never could reach them....I gather they were too busy looking for more listings, these girls always available, ALL THE TIME , that was important to us! Thanks ladies!
Having 3 working hard to sell my home proved to make a difference, I never felt like my home wasn't getting their full attention! Their motto being The Power of 3 is so true!

We didn’t discover these ladies until after our first agent we had to change due to lack of communication with us, let me assure you they were exactly what their names says available 24/7
Add to that they even paid for the repairs that needed to be completed, which were less than $500, but still....that was the icing for us! Great team work for sure
Amazing experience, I was able to reach them at all times!  That is a first for us, usually, we listed a home, never to hear from the agent again!  Great team

Why would anyone want one agent, when you can have 3 working for you, we found having 3 who always knew what was going on at all times, extremely a plus with our purchase, thanks to you all, we love our home
When we ever buy or sell again, these girls better be around! The best we have ever experienced!
Yes, for sure this is the team to have on your side!

We really have not had good experiences with many agents but we can honestly say this was the best experience we ever had and the entire selling our home and buying another was just picture perfect with these girls
We certainly do suggest you call these 3! They always took our calls and addressed our questions most important went above to help sell our parents home

Listed my home with these girls and they keep us fully informed every week! That made us feel like our business was of value to them! Then they paid for the repairs that needed to be completed after the inspection and even handled getting them done! After buying 12 homes over the years that was a first even if the repairs were only $378, they handled the entire process and paid and even paid to ha e our home cleaned after our move out so we would not have to, We actually for the first time enjoyed selling a home as it was stress free! Thanks girls! You clearly know what it means to provide service

You Bet we remommend, where else can we shout it out! Our last experience with a agent was terrrible, they may hold a license and call themselves a agent but there is a difference. We expect a lot, we expect to have someone who can close deals, who know how to negotiate, who understand how to get past the negative issues that may arise, in fact, how to turn a negative into a positive ! This is th team you want
We have discovered Agents that will be placed on our speed Dial! We liked that much! Serious, great group of ladies
We enjoyed working with you girls, we highly we will many about you 3!  They are 24/7 people! I texted one night at 12:30 am thinking they will see in am, NOPE, they replied right back! Amazing!

We used this team to show us around, they did a great job, they actually listened!  The first house we saw, they said, this fits all your wants list, and feel the best fit, I didn't get over excited, until after 13 more homes and we went back to first one, and she was right! We love our new home, it is perfect! So you were so right!
Thanks, you girls really made us feel like you cared about where we landed! Thanks for taking the time out to help us find the perfect place

We are glad to tell the world that we loved these girls made selling our home so easy! They even paid for my repairs and even had the home cleaned so I would not have to after we moved out!  Really just great service

We worked with teams before only now to discover the others just called themselves a team, or had assistants doing the work but could not address our questions! This team was extremely proficient on every aspect of the process! Just amazing service. Not to mention those wonderful U-tube videos Jayne does!  We felt like we knew exactly what we were buying into
Two words! THE BEST!

The best! A team that really knows how to make a sale move through the process with such ease! They even paid for the repairs that needed to be completed after the inspection, paid for them and even had them done! That’s service folks!

We only have a few words to share with all!  THESE ARE THE GIRLS YOU WANT AND NEED! 24/7 Service played a vital role in us getting the home we wanted! They wrote the offer at 11:15 PM, we had signed by 11:45, and offer accepted by 10PM the next day! Great Team
My brother and I thank you all for everything! What a wonderful experience!

We spend two days with these girls trying to determine if this area was for us! We felt they cared enough to really help us make the right decision, we soon understood this was not for us! The time they spend with us we so enjoyed and will tell everyone to call you! We will keep in touch

We lost our mother and had to sell her home from a distance, not to mention the furniture! These girls did it all we never had to travel down and we can’t thank you all enough! It was just too hard on us to lose her and then have to handle the home she loves so much. We thank you!
You lose! IF you don’t call these girls! The reviews are all true! The best in the Villages! Take that back! The best experience we have ever had!
Highly suggest you call them! Don’t and I will be the first to tell you told you so!
Why hire one when you get three! The service was spot on! That was the beauty of 3!

We didn’t use these girls to sell our house, but they did bring us a buyer and we sent the girls more than the agent who listed our home! Once our home went under contract our agent disappeared! Until time to get there check! We saw how hard these ladies worked for their folks and we are so sorry we didnt use these girls to sell our home!  Next time girls we promise
We got more than we expected! Our friends highly suggested we call these ladies, we did and trust us! USE THEM!

Here is what was amazing to us! Purchased  a home, we felt they represented us well, but the services we were given after, just amazing! Got a 2 hour Golf cart tour whoch was to teach us how to get around! That was very helpful! THEN this was the kicker....we got to invite 20 people, we invited our new neigbors and they provided one heck of a food spread for us to get to know our new neigbors, now that was far beyond anything I have ever seen any agent do! They care! We never felt like just another sale!

Found this team on-line, liked what I read, most important, I thought, Wow, three hands on agents working in my behalf! Add to that they claim available 24/7 service, all I can say is this is the team you should turn too! Hands down services that really I didn't expect!
This was by far by the best experience we have ever had with selling our home!

Want Service? You will get more than just selling or listing a home with these girls, highly impressed that Service is far more important to these girls, thanks for all you three did! Highly recommend!  YOU BET WE DO!
We would certainly highly suggest using these girls!
You will not go wrong using this team, girls were great, and they are available 24/7.  That made a difference, as a home came available and within 3 hours we had it under contract
Wonderful folks to work with, it was actually enjoyable to buy a home with them! What I liked the most, was NOT in a hurry, really listened, and we finally found the perfect one
Very difficult family matter was involved, but this team handled it with such ease, we could not thank them enough

Yes, for sure WE RECOMMEND!  HIGHLY Recommend!  In fact, big mistake if you don't!  Over the years, we have used many agents, this by far our best experience!  We never had one issue calling them and getting someone!  Clearly our business was important as every call and email and even Text was handled asap!  Highly Recommend!

If we could afford it, we would buy another Home with these ladies, they made the purchase so easy! Their name matches their service! Worked with a couple before these girls, but they were just in a hurry to get a sale, NO concern for what we wanted! This team took their time working with us" That is what you need!
Great concept to have 3 on a team! Available always! Never ONE missed call!
You bet we recommend, really we don't even write reviews! These girls were just plain Great!  Service was what these girls are all about
My question to ask is WHY would anyone hire one when you can get 3 for the price of 1, so the service I got was beyond what I even expected

Worked with these ladies, however, had to purchase a Village home that fit my needs, and because I discovered buying from the villages means NO representation as a buyer! TOO big of an investment so I had the team handle the entire process and SO glad I DID!  I could tell you the several issues that came up, that the Villages and their sales people didn't care one bit, GET a these girls when you are forced to buy a Village Property
😂😂😂😂😂😱😱😱😱This is what will happen to you if YOU DON'T have these girls sell your Home! Want this😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😘😘😘😘😘 Then get these ladies
Great, if you want hard working enjoyable people to work with, these 3 are IT

Listed my home with these ladies, spoke with several before I did, I was experience enough to know what my home should be listed more, and they were the ones who were told me like it was, all others came in a lot higher to give us false hopes I guess, well...the girls were 5,000 less in value than I was, but they were correct as I sold within 30 days at 2k less than they said, we they come to the table with the facts!
Wonderful, so my experience was great, best I have had in years selling my home!
Do I recommend! YOU BET!

Listed our home with these girls, we listened, they were right! purchased a home with these girls and again...they were right! We found the perfect area for us! Want someone who cares, what someone who actually listens...GET the girls!
Need to sell! Call these girls! Highly Recommend!

You bet we do, we recommend them highly! Having 3 working for you is great! Not to mention we enjoyed the actual closing, that's a first for us! They made this event less stressful Keepimg us fully informed! WE recommend
Great, Just plain Great! You were so right! This home is perfect fit!
In all my years I haven't had much good experience with agents. UNTIL now! What is the difference with these girls is that they are more about understanding my needs, it's called they listen!

This team is very professional and  great service  Since purchasing a home is the biggest investment most people ever make, it's important to have faith in your real estate agent.  With this in mind, we were not disappointed in our buying experience with this team

The service is outstanding. I closed in May 2016. I am new to the area and I still telephone asking questions. I called Kris asking about how I can refinance my home since the interest rates are going down. She gave me a couple options. They really care about you and try to get the best deal   possible for everyone involved in the process. They are great

Where do I begin with this fantastic TEAM!  I am a recent client that interviewed several agents to list my parents house and settle their estate.  Years of expertise and a provided stager gave this group our business.  My parents had done a lot of "unique" things to the home.  The Team along with   Cindy Griffin, the home stager and decorator on the Team, turned those unique qualities into sought after assets to this home.  The fact that they brought to the table a fantastic audio/visual person to shoot the home AND a home stager made this home POP for buyers.  Their suggestions on price, their expertise in the Villages market, and the eye for maximizing the home's value made them great to work with.  Communication was key due to the fact we were listing the home from Arizona.  Not a problem, they are used to these situations and cater accordingly.  Through their extensive marketing and open houses, they found us the perfect buyer in the perfect amount of time.  My wife and I are so glad we chose the 247 TEAM!!!  Thank you so much!!

From start to finish with my house-hunting and purchase experience, the Team,  was professional, very helpful and a joy to work with!  Looked at several homes and they had the answers to my many questions responding in a timely & friendly manner. This was mostly a long   distance transaction and I so appreciated all the work they put in to accomplish my goal!
Just GREAT group of girls, was amazed with their service level

Our intentions were to buy in the Villages, these girls care!  They spend a great deal of time educating us, only for that to allow us to understand the Villages and discovered not exactly what we wanted and found a home nearby that we just love!  Thanks, highly recommend these ladies

Experienced Agent myself, used this team to purchase in Florida, a long distance site unseen purchased and so glad I used these agents! They taught me a few things, most important was that service for them is first, real estate is second! I felt in good hands during the whole process.

TEAM! Careful when you hire a team! NOT all are equal! Several years ago, hired a team, only to find out they called themselves a team, it was a single agent with assistants, who never could answer one question! Not one, always had to call the agent! NOT THIS TEAM! VERY IMPRESSIVE group of ladies!
List and purchased a home with this team, I read the reviews and felt I was in good hands,  so the results are in; beyond my expectations!
Get 3, and what you get it amazing service!
You BET we recommend! Trust us!
You listened, and we achieved everything we were looking for and MORE, and the MORE is having you three as friends now!
Just an Amazing treat!  They really do put service first!
Great education as to what area best fit us! Thanks ever so much...one year later and we are so happy you girls took such time to listen! We are so happy where we landed! Thanks to each of you!

Very impressive! You guys really made buying a home enjoyable!  We loved the special touch of bring over food for 20 so,that we could enjoy our new homes with friends and family! WOW! That is going far beyond than anything we have ever seen! Thanks...do people know how well you girls cook! 😄
Sold many homes, and first time I have ever felt the need to take the time out to write such! This is by far the best experience we have EVER had!

There are not enough words to say how much we appreciated your help! Talk about going beyond! They purchased 20 bags of mulch and dressed up my front yard! I just was not able to do the work with such medical issues, thanks! Trust me folks, get this team to sell your home! They care about what they are doing!
Thanks, we are glad we listed our home with you girls! They stepped it up to make the deal work!  They really care about their clients!
Looking for a agent that actually you can reach! Look no further! It's a hands-on team of three agents YOU need!
What we love about working with these ladies is how they actually listen, most important we are able to reach them quickly! That's valuable when you are trying to find the perfect home!

Thank you, thank you, thank you. Amazing....just flat out amazing group of ladies that really go far beyond most.  Even posted my furniture on-line to sell for me! Took the calls and even went over to make the sale and then deliver the money to me...now that's service! Beyond selling the home!

We were very impressed with this team's professionalism and knowledge of the market. All the detail were handled making the sale so much easier than I had ever experiecned before, thanks ladies, really!

They were wonderful. They helped staged my home, and spend a lot of time with me until I found just the right one. They even watched my dog once when I needed to go out of town, unreal, they go the extra mile, and beyond!

We highly recommend Your 24/7 Team. We called them one day while driving around The Villages looking for our dream home. That call was immediately answered and we were met within minutes for a private showing. The home was not exactly what we were looking for but the agent asked us about our   'wish list' and due to her knowledge of homes in the area, took us to the home we excitedly made an offer on and purchased! The entire experience of buying our new home and listing and selling our previous home was effortless because they walked us through every aspect. We were so impressed by their knowledge and marketing skills that my parents also used them to list their home and downsize and purchase their courtyard villa. You will be very impressed by these women. They are personable, experienced, and knowledgeable in all aspects of buying and/or selling! You won't regret contacting Your 24/7 Team for all your real estate needs

Team were absolutely fabulous!  The attention to detail and helping us through the process was beyond professional.  Team was always there to answer my questions and went beyond to support us in this major life event.  The 247 Team far exceeded any expectations we ever had. We will   strongly recommend The Team to all we come into contact with.  Thanks again 247 TEAM!!

Very Professional! Handled every problem quickly   They were cheerful and supportive and worked for my benefit from start to finish. They provided information beyond the scope of the deal that was very helpful.

I was in a fix on account of the circumstances of my retirement in California.   I needed to buy my home in The Villages remotely, and the ladies of my 247 Team understood my predicament.  They found my beautiful furnished home, and saw the purchase through with professionalism, competence, and   patience.  They were responsive to my questions and concerns.  They bargained for the golf cart!  Months after closing, when I arrived in Florida for good, Jayne took me for an informative and reassuring golf cart lesson, providing the confidence I needed to get around in my buggy.  So much fun!  These ladies love The Villages, and their enthusiasm is contagious.

rol, Kris and Jayne are a fantastic team and they work extremely hard for the client.  If you are selling your property, they know the market thoroughly and provide insightful suggestions to be sure the property shows the best possible.  If you are buying a property, they work tirelessly to find   the property that meets all your requirements.  These three wonderful real estate professionals truly worked 24/7 for us selling our home and showing us prospective new home properties.  They always made it possible for us to view a property, no matter how short a notice or the time of day that was convenient for us.  We absolutely highly recommend them to anyone looking to sell or buy.  You will truly get a "TEAM" that works for you 24/7!

They were wonderful.  they helped me to Stage my house, and to show me many properties until I found the right one. They even watched my dog once when I needed them     I would recommend the team totally...    thank you

My family and I turned to the 24/7 team to help sell my parents' home in the Villages after my father became ill and passed away. We found the 24/7 Team to be caring, organized, professional and responsive at all stages of the listing and sales process. Their professional staging efforts really   helped to showcase the home's strengths to prospective buyers. I recommend the 24/7 Team wholeheartedly

This team is VERY impressive. They lived up to their name "247" (24 hours a day, 7 days a week) within the first 5 minutes when I requested information about a home at 11:30pm.  From there, they consistently went above and beyond for us. One of the things they did for us that no other agent has   ever done was they previewed homes for us and used face time - it was as if they were showing us the home in person (saved us a great deal of time and money as we were out of state buyers). I also like (love) their willingness to facilitate a win/win for us the buyer and the seller. I will not hesitate to use them again and refer them over and over. Whether you're out of state or live in the area --- I highly recommend this team

We live in CA and could only visit the Villages for our house hunting trip. The rest of the process was completed long distance. The 24/7 team took care of all of the details for us. They ensured that all the issues uncovered in the inspection were corrected and they were readily available to   answer all of our questions throughout the process. We couldn't be happier with our home buying experience. We highly recommend the team!
Fun and very detailed.  Best I’ve ever worked with in all my moves.

We were very pleased with home selling experience with the 24/7 team.  They did a wonderful job marketing our home and finding a qualified buyer in a relatively short amount of time.  They were always available to speak with us, even late at night and on weekends.  They worked 24/7 as their name   implies.  They provided information to us in a timely manner, explained things fully and were extremely professional.  They took care of all the details and provided extra support since we were selling the home from out of state and could not be there in person much of the time.  If we need to sell another home in The Villages, we will certainly rehire them and we would recommend them to anyone looking for an excellent real estate agent in area

I would give the 24/7 team 10 stars if that were an option.  I've dealt with many realtors and they were the most accommodating ever.  Their response time to questions is incredible.  I highly recommend the 24/7 team.
They do exactly what they say they will do! We were at ease buying this home sight unseen knowing they were taking care of every little detail! Thanks girls
I highly recommend these Ladies I don’t believe you could do better
Highest recommendations. Quick fast and helpful service.
Get 3!  We said why not! What we got was  just plain GREAT service!

Highly Recommend, no question about it!  Many times listed my home with others after I signed contract to list never could reach the agent so my concerns were if I can't reach you how can the buyers ! NOT these girls, always available

Amazing!  Working with a team gave us a edge to getting results fast! Impressive Team, their commitment to 24/7 Service is in fact TRUE!
Great Service! Quick response to every call I had to make! Love that! You will too! Working with a team was a big plus! 24/7 service for sure!

These three ladies helped us buy our house at The Villages early this year so we have become snowbirds!
They have knowledge of real estate and made our purchase flawless. We can't praise them enough and have recommended them to our friends that are thinking of following in our footsteps. 
They truly are 24/7 and wonderful people so if you are looking for a real estate agent look no further! This is your team! You won't regret it.

The 24/7 Team is an awesome group of ladies. We saw a listing online for a house in The Villages. I called and left a message. Jayne called back almost immediately! Arrangements were made to look at the house. We loved the house and the location! Carol was always just a phone call away. Kris was always willing to meet us or take us to a meeting. The team was with us throughout the process with help, suggestions, and great advice! We had family and friends visit and they offered to meet us so our daughter and friends could actually see the house! If you're looking for a new home or have a home to sell, these ladies will get the job done quickly and professionally!
